meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny - Hippo Penny! That's me, folks, your go-to guy for all things gaming and hilarity!

Now, let's dive into the world of Read Only Memories: NEURODIVER. This sci-fi romp has got everyone talking, from Slant Magazine's 60 out of 100 (ouch!) to God is a Geek's glowing 95 out of 100! But what does it all mean? Can this game live up to its creative premise?

As I dived into the world of NEURODIVER, I found myself drawn into an immersive futuristic experience. The characters are quirky and lovable (RPG Fan agrees!), and the story is a wild ride. Gamers Heroes thinks so too, giving it an 85 out of 100!

Now, let's get to those naysayers! Slant Magazine thought NEURODIVER was a bit of a disappointment, while Checkpoint Gaming called it "underwhelming" and "disappointing". But what did Noisy Pixel think? Well, they gave it a solid 70 out of 100, praising the visuals and gameplay concept!

And then there's Shacknews, who thinks NEURODIVER is so close to being an all-timer! If only it had a bit more narrative depth and some puzzle guardrails... Hmm, sounds like someone might be a bit harsh on the game!

So, what did I think? Well, let's just say that NEURODIVER has got me hooked! I loved exploring the world, chatting with the characters, and solving those puzzles. Sure, it's not perfect - we've all got our criticisms (hello, Slant Magazine!) - but overall, I'm having a blast!

And that's Hippo Penny's two cents on Read Only Memories: NEURODIVER! What do you think? Have you played the game? Share your thoughts in the comments below!
